titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on the credit for biomass stoves and boilers.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on the credit for biomass stoves and boilers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill increases the allowable amount of the energy efficient home improvement tax credit for biomass stoves and boilers.
